sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' class BodyFatCalc extends Component { state = { gender:'', abdominal:'', tricep:'', thigh:'', suprailiac:'', bodyFat:'' } render() { return ( < div className = "px-12 py-10" >

Calculate your body fat percentage

< div className = "p-10 w-1/5 mx-0 my-auto" >
< div className = "flex flex-row w-2/5 p-10 mx-0 my-auto" >
< div className = "flex flex-row justify-between" >
< div className = "flex flex-row justify-between mt-5" > < input type = "text" id = "thigh" className = "w-1/5" /> < div class = "flex flex-col" > < div class = "flex flex-row justify-between" > < label for = "surpiliac" > Supriliac < /label> < div class = "flex flex-row justify-between mt-5" > < label for = "tricep" > Tricep < /label> < div className = "w-1/5 mx-0 my-auto p-10" > ) } } export default BodyFatCalc
